text: Niklas Hoffmann (born 9 April 1997) is a German footballer who plays as a centre-back for Würzburger Kickers. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at DFB.de * Profile at kicker.de Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Landau Category:Footballers from Rhineland- Palatinate Category:German footballers Category:Association football central defenders Category:Karlsruher SC II players Category:Karlsruher SC players Category:SC Freiburg II players Category:FC St. Pauli II players Category:FC St. Pauli players Category:Würzburger Kickers players Category:2. title: Niklas Hoffmann
